name: Career Online High School
description: Free accredited high school diploma, career certificate, and career portfolio including resume and cover letter with extensive career development support
fullDescription: Career Online High School is a free program through participating California libraries that allows adults to earn an accredited high school diploma and career certificate.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accredited high school diploma
- Career certificate in your chosen field
- Career portfolio with resume and cover letter
- Academic coach support
- Self-paced online learning
- 8 career certificate tracks available
howToGetIt:
1. Must be 19+ years old (or 18 in some libraries)
2. Have a library card in good standing at a participating library
3. Complete the prerequisite courses (free orientation)
4. Apply to the program
5. If accepted, complete coursework online
6. Graduate with diploma and career certificate
keywords: Career Online High School, GED alternative, high school diploma, adult education, career certificate, accredited, online learning, free diploma
